Articles.Content:
I started playing kerbal a while ago, but it wasn't until now that I found the forum. I'm kind of experienced in the sense of achieving things, but not really doing them too precisely.

Achievements in game so far:

- Made it into orbit

- Made a satellite and put it in orbit

- Landed on the Mun

- Landed on Minimus

- Made a space station around Kerbin (the first time I've ever docked) (did it today)
Hey BuzzAlderkerb. If you can do those things, you have the skills to do pretty much everything else in the game. It's just a matter of scaling things up.
